content:
Attributes - In Headers Cont.

  • “RetrieveAttributes” “:” 1#AttributeNames

    • Does not waste bandwidth.
    • Piggybacks requests/responses - Server has to parse every request to find header, Set Headers, & Error Message
    • Only requires 1 request.
    • Not Backwards Compatible - New Headers & Needs PEP
